summary: This document is a Durable Power of Attorney for Ghislaine Maxwell, authorizing her agent to manage her financial affairs with JPMorgan Private Bank. It outlines the powers granted to the agent, including the ability to operate bank accounts, engage in transactions, and manage investments on behalf of Maxwell.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Ghislaine Maxwell is the individual granting power of attorney to her agents for managing her financial affairs.

persons.name: Harry Seller
persons.context: Harry Seller is named as one of the attorneys authorized to act on behalf of Ghislaine Maxwell under the Durable Power of Attorney.

connections.description: Ghislaine Maxwell has appointed Harry Seller as her attorney-in-fact, granting him authority to manage her financial affairs.

keyFacts: The document is a Durable Power of Attorney for Ghislaine Maxwell, allowing her agent to manage her financial affairs.
Harry Seller is authorized to act on behalf of Ghislaine Maxwell as her attorney-in-fact.
The powers granted to the agent include operating bank accounts, engaging in transactions, and managing investments.
The document states that the powers continue until revoked or upon Maxwell's death.
Notarization is required for the document to be valid.
